name: Intrinsic Pool Master: 8 Ball Snooker Club
name_original: Intrinsic Pool Master: 8 Ball Snooker Club
description:
Classic features of challenges and mission with quick responsive and fast strike rate, adds to the fun of this game. Strike well, pot the ball, and repeat, until you have potted all the balls in the holes. Good luck with your target strike.

Try your ultimate luck this time. Intrinsic pool master: 8 ball snooker club is the most addictive sports games Best Snooker Billiards Game Ever. Shoot pool just like in real life! 

Are you a billiard player? if no then become one, here is your open chance to become the king of snooker club. Enter this addictive gameplay in the city heights club. Get your striking stick, put some powder on its top, get the balls set on table, choose your opponent, or if you are willing to play it alone for a good practice then get into one. Lift your stick, aim and target at the balls, pot them in the basket, hole, one after the other. Sports are an arcade entertainment for real men and gameboys.
